main event: Multiple witnesses from Indianapolis reported sightings of unidentified flying objects over several days, including a blue disc and a bright light that exhibited unusual movement.
interesting points: Witnesses reported seeing a blue disc with red and white lights that they believed to be an aircraft,One observer was a 14-year-old boy who described seeing a light and disk shape moving at high speeds,Multiple instances of stationary lights were observed changing colors and flashing, One sighting involved a bright light that hovered before darting away quickly,Several reports were documented by Project Blue Book.
sighted object: blue disc with red and white lights, bright light in the sky
witness description: A 14-year-old boy, several civilians including a mother with her children
